name: ai-face-recognition-demo
description: AI-powered face recognition demo using WebGPU, ONNX Runtime, and MediaPipe

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required - serving static files'
scripts.deploy-chunked: mv public/models/adaface_r50.onnx ~/adaface_r50.onnx.backup && npm run deploy && mv ~/adaface_r50.onnx.backup public/models/adaface_r50.onnx

author: AI Face Recognition Demo
